website_summaries.verdict: The three Zeiss ExoLens' for iPhone are fun to use and will improve your photographs, but not everyone will think they're worth the money.
pros: The Zeiss ExoLens series delivers excellent photo quality (for the iPhone), with no artifacts and great sharpness
cons: The screw mount can be awkward for quick swaps, the bracket mount blocks the camera's flash and you're bound to lose the tiny back caps

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but very nice lens, nearly rectilinear
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but very nice lens, nearly rectilinear, works on 7+ too, mount is a little difficult to slide on and off but thus is very secure. It is compatible with bitplay clip.
customer_reviews.author: Rachapol Raising

customer_reviews.title: Works so much better than I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my iPhone 6. Sliding the lens off and on is not especially easy but it works. I have to remember to turn my flash off or I get little dots of light on the picture. This works so much better than it has any right to (although Zeiss lenses have been really good since before World War II). As I recall it was really cheap, too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Toppins

customer_reviews.title: Not new as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Lens is great , however advertised stated new product. It was actually 2nd hand product. Packaging showed repackaging sticker.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lin

customer_reviews.title: excellent mount, excellent lens.
customer_reviews.text: excellent mount, excellent lens. I wish they sell mounts for other phones so I could continue using the lens with other than the iPhone 6,7
customer_reviews.author: Hollo

customer_reviews.title: It's a great lens! I'd love that ZEISS would make more ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great lens! I'd love that ZEISS would make more variety of focal length ones too. They should keep in mind that most iPhones have a screen protector and the ExoLens is perfectly made for when one does not have a screen-protector; making it very hard to put on and off, and even chipping the screen-protector or scratching the rubber inside the ExoLens to manage to get it on.
customer_reviews.author: chuchie

customer_reviews.title: this one is very good.
customer_reviews.text: The lens is acceptable,but the iPhone has its limitations when you use these telephoto lenses. Not so with the wide angle lens, this one is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment, but get the case, too.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this immediately before a trip along the CA coast and was extremely pleased with the results. I’m no expert on optics, but this did precisely what I wanted. The lack of a fifth star was because it would have been impractical without also purchasing the matching case.
customer_reviews.author: tdm

customer_reviews.title: Best lens in the industry
customer_reviews.text: Get them while their available! Exolens will no longer make these lens, and, as a cinematographer, these lens cause almost 0 distortion and are super clear. Worth the money as they used to be 200 dollars. Only get the Carl Zeiss models from exolens
customer_reviews.author: Richie Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Very useful then 7 plus second camera because the second iPhone ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it to film some event and festival. Very useful then 7 plus second camera because the second iPhone camera need more light to work but this lens works anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Conti

customer_reviews.title: Best in its class
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent lens and if got it for $58.00 like me then you got a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Bond

customer_reviews.title: Top quality lens
customer_reviews.text: Solid lens, very clear edge to edge. The edge attachment is solid but I had to grind it down a little to get it over the screen protector on my phone. The bracket mount is better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent build quality and image quality. The clamp works great. The only downside is the weight of the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Jan

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Its a snug fit on the camera. Beware, the mount will not go in even if you have a screen protector mounted on the camera. Its very German, you follow the instructions, do as told, its mounts fine, stays there, and takes amazing shots. Color render and clarity is amazing, you won't believe the shots are taken by the same iPhone. I got it on a clearance discount so I am even happier.
customer_reviews.author: Subir Sarbabidya

customer_reviews.title: Love the lens but the mounting bracket is not very ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the lens but the mounting bracket is not very good. Plus you can't use a phone case with it.
customer_reviews.author: 13Alumen

product_meta.title: ExoLens with Optics by ZEISS Mutar 2.0X Asph T Telephoto Lens for iPhone 7, 6s, 6s Plus, 6, 6 Plus

Lens: ZEISS Mutar 2.0x Asph T Telephoto Lens (56mm equivalent)
